name: pulse codex demo
description:
An experimental musical composition inside videogame mechanics.

An audiovisual asemic codex.

Featuring:
  • a blend of ink doodles, claymotion and shaders, rendered in crunchy 540p
  • xenmodal microtuned music
  • unusually obscure gameplay *

* interactive tutorial included!

Game Modes:
  • 1P Journey is for single player
  • 2P Versus is for local player vs player
  • Jukebox let you listen to the computer playing against itself
  • Tutorial is for learning how to play
Controls ( reconfigurable in settings ) :
  • wasd / arrows / dpad
  • Enter / K : accept
  • Backspace / J : cancel
  • ESC : pause menus, goes back in menus
Minimum Requirements:
  • i5 3th gen or equivalent
  • craphic card supporting OpenGL 3.3, integrated is fine
  • on linux: glibc >2.29, X11

it could also work on OSX by using WINE (the window build is also tested with it).

Full Game Release:

probably in the late spring 2023.
